subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Joseph Addai and Dominic Rhodes will never receive the attention that Edgerrin James does, but in a rainy and sloppy Super Bowl at Dolphin Stadium on Sunday night, they carried the day.
snippet: Joseph Addai and Dominic Rhodes will never receive the attention that Edgerrin James does, but in a rainy and sloppy Super Bowl at Dolphin Stadium on Sunday night, they carried the day.
